extractedCharacters.name: Amelia
extractedCharacters.description: A brilliant software engineer with a passion for AI, working at a local tech startup.

extractedCharacters.name: Raj
extractedCharacters.description: A charismatic chef who owns a popular fusion restaurant downtown.

extractedCharacters.name: Sofia
extractedCharacters.description: A retired marine biologist turned urban gardener, with a rooftop greenhouse.

extractedCharacters.name: Liam
extractedCharacters.description: A struggling musician with dreams of stardom, living in the apartment below Sofia's.

extractedCharacters.name: Zoe
extractedCharacters.description: An ambitious environmental lawyer fighting to protect the city's coastline, Liam's roommate.

extractedCharacters.name: Mrs. Chen
extractedCharacters.description: An elderly widow who practices tai chi and gossips with her cat, Whiskers.

extractedCharacters.name: Dr. Elias
extractedCharacters.description: A veterinarian who runs a small clinic on the ground floor of the building.

extractedCharacters.name: Mia
extractedCharacters.description: A bubbly college student studying animal behavior, assistant to Dr. Elias.

extractedCharacters.name: Jack
extractedCharacters.description: An eccentric dog walker known for his colorful bowties and the pack of mismatched dogs that follow him.

extractedCharacters.name: Detective Olivia Harper
extractedCharacters.description: A no-nonsense police officer with a secret passion for painting, recently moved into the penthouse suite.
